parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Direction of end conditions as defined in swCoreFeatureDirection_e

title: ICoreFeatureData.EndCondition
description: Gets or sets the end condition in the specified direction for this core feature.

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Direction of end conditions as defined in swCoreFeatureDirection_e

returns: Type of end conditions as defined in swEndConditions_e (see Remarks )
remarks:
Valid end conditions are swEndConditions_e:
swEndCondBlind
swEndCondThroughAll
swEndCondThroughNext
